feed.title: Anything to chat about today at 21:00 UTC ?

entry.title: Anything to chat about today at 21:00 UTC ?
entry.summary: Gavin Andresen, a prominent figure in the Bitcoin community, posted an announcement on the #bitcoin-development IRC channel regarding the upcoming Tuesday IRC meeting. The meeting will cover various topics including the duplicate coinbase attack/fix and the strategy for rolling out sipa's fix. Additionally, the 0.6 release schedule will be discussed along with potential solutions to attract a talented Windows developer to address ongoing issues. Lastly, the meeting will cover the next-steps for multisignature and who is working on what.
